dataset.title: Census of species recorded during phytosociological surveys in Benin

abstract.para: A list a plant species recorded through phytosociological surveys in Benin

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

taxonomicCoverage.generalTaxonomicCoverage: Papilionaceae, Poaceae, Cyperaceae, Asteraceae, Malvaceae, Onagraceae, Scrophulariaceae, Annonaceae, Acanthaceae, Araceae, Lythraceae, ,Papilionnaceae, Rubiaceae, Fabaceae, Sterculiaceae, Asclepiadaceae, Lamiaceae, Convolvulaceae, Cucurbitaceae, Euphorbiaceae, Cochlospermaceae, Commelinaceae, Asphodelaceae, Taccaceae, Hydrophyllaceae, Amaranthaceae, Hypoxidaceae, Tiliaceae, Caesalpiniaceae, Combretaceae, Mimosaceae, Verbenaceae, Meliaceae, Moraceae, Sapotaceae, Sapindaceae, Amaryllidaceae, Orchidaceae, Alismataceae, Dioscoreaceae, Anacardiaceae, Bombacaceae, Ebenaceae, Vitaceae, Gentianaceae, Zingiberaceae, Asparagaceae, Anthericaceae, Araliaceae, Arecaceae, Celastraceae, Bignoniaceae, Opiliaceae, Flacourtiaceae, Olacaceae, Campanulaceae, Pedaliaceae, Nyctaginaceae, Caryophyllaceae, Oxalidaceae, Colchiaceae, Solanaceae, Ulmaceae, Capparaceae, Loganiaceae, Polygalaceae, Melastomataceae, Ranunculaceae, Iridaceae, Ochnaceae, Dipterocarpaceae, Simaroubaceae, Ochnaceae, Chrysobalanaceae, Violaceae, Rhamnaceae, Apocynaceae

gbif.citation: Gangnibo C N, Gbètoho A J (2016). Census of species recorded during phytosociological surveys in Benin. Version 1.1. GBIF Benin. Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/6habyb accessed via GBIF.org on 2020-01-20.

Université d'Abomey-Calavi ; 187 p
